title: #315: Correcting Quillette's Analysis of "Allen v. Farrow" (AvF - Part 9)
description:
Laura brings to our attention a podcast that was "associated" with RCP on Spotify. They too covered the HBO Docu-series "Allen v Farrow", but their take could not be more different than our analysis, and we want to set the record straight. It is important to note that Woody Allen has always denied any wrongdoing and has never been charged nor convicted of any crime. 

The original podcast we are referring to if you want to hear it and judge for yourself can be found at: https://quillette.com/2021/04/04/podcast-143-daphne-merkin-on-the-baseless-abuse-claims-against-woody-allen-and-why-the-media-refuses-to-let-them-die/


#webelieveDylan

#victimsmatter

#dylanfarrow

#miafarrow

#woodyallen

#janedoefilms

#allenvfarrow

SUPPORT OUR OTHER SHOWS! 


CRIME ANALYST - Across The Forgotten Victim series, Laura Richards analyses and deconstructs the murders and attacks on lone women committed by Peter Sutcliffe (known as PS throughout the series) in the north east of England in the 1960s and 1970s. Laura believes this is one of the most misunderstood cases of our time. Join Laura each week in the intelligence cell as she behaviourally breaks down each attack and highlights which cases she believes to be linked, why PS did what he did and how he was allowed to get away with it for so long. www.crime-analyst.com 


KILLER CASTING PODCAST - Lisa, Brian and Dean are joined by none other than Special Agent Emily Prentiss herself, PAGET BREWSTER! Paget catches us up on everything she has been doing, watching cooking shows, playing Talulah Bankhead, deciding whether to dye her hair or not (Lisa says NO)...and we get very silly. Tune into www.killercastingpod.com or go to wherever you listen to your podcasts including Apple Podcasts, Spotify and Stitcher. Or click here for the latest show! https://killercasting.libsyn.com
